title: Western Australia Players over 20 looking for serious team for next season (Silver or Gold only)
body:
Want to put a team together for next year to be competitive.

This will be a heavy CC focus team primarily focussing on team-fights.

Conditions-

Must Be From Western Australia 
Must Have mic for chat.
Must be currently in Silver or Gold.
Must want to constantly improve 
Must want to win as a team

Be able to play on Friday nights West Aus time 8.30pm till late or Saturday 8.30pm till late.

Currently need - 

Support
Top
Jungle
ADC

Please put your interest below.

Cheers

replies.body:
Hey guys,

Not sure if you are still looking for players as this thread is a month old now!

Buuut, I'm a WA based ADC main! =D

Currently in London as I have been living in the UK since around Feb this year (2016) and have been playing on EUW over here. Ended the season in Silver 2 (didn't have a lot of time to play while travelling and working, etc.)

My OCE account will have ended in Bronze as I only completed my placements+a few other games before moving over to the UK.

Ill be back in WA early December and am keen to find a team to play on or even some new friends to play with as a lot of my mates don't play LoL as much anymore! =(

Would also be nice to have friends to banter with about LCS (if anyone watches)

Anyways; IGN; Ruke23 on Both servers right now

I also have a couple of YouTube Vids I made a couple of years ago (might start making more once I'm back in Aus!)

My best video can be found here: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ebfq9ladWo

Thank you!! =D

silver sup :D i'd be able to play most friday and saturday nights ofc varying on me own personal life
I main sona and morganna atm, but I'm improving on Janna and working on playing with Leona
chuck us an add in game <3

Hey sir, I am an ex OPL player, I use to play mid laner for SIN. I become manager for them when I got busy with school.

My main got perm banned as I use to be toxic. I am no longer toxic and love playing as a team. Please reply to me. 

You're welcome to add my account i'm using at the moment. IGN Only smurf AU. I can play most roles fluently but my best is ADC and jungle. Thanks for your consideration.

Sounds good bro We need an ADC, are you from Western Australia though
No I am not boss, but I can fly over anytime needed. I can take time off work when ever needed etc. Thanks mate for the reply.
Why does it matter if they are from Western Australia?

> [{quoted}](name=Cyrater,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=zJflB8sE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-12T06:06:27.055+0000)

To meet up eventually and so we all are on around the same time. If you really really want to join ill msg you if we find no people in WA
